Class StructTSModel

Represents basic structural models (BSM).

Direct Superclass

  • FitModel

Important Dependencies

  • stats::StructTS

  • forecast::forecast

Public methods

  • buildModel() passes on fitting and forecasting functions to FitModel's method setFittedFcasted; ignores passing function which checks whether residuals are not independently distributed

  • useModel(fcast_period) calls FitModel's method executeUseModel to fit model and forecast fcast_period-step ahead future; passes on the same fitting and forecasting functions as buildmodel()

Contents

  • Direct Superclass
  • Important Dependencies
  • Public methods
